input: What’s the GST rate for online gaming services?
output: For FY 2025-26, online gaming services (SAC: 998439) are taxed at 28% GST on the full value of consideration (not just platform fees). Example: ₹1,000 game entry → GST = ₹280. File GSTR-1 and GSTR-3B. Ensure HSN/SAC accuracy to avoid notices.
